Defuse.description: Put your last drawn card back into the deck

Attack.description: End your turn without drawing a card. Force the next player to take two turns.

Favor.description: One player must give you a card of their choice

Nope.description: Stop the action of another player. You can play this at any time.

Skip.description: End your turn without drawing a card

See the Future.description: Privately view the top three cards of the deck
